text: قالوا۟ تالله انك لفى ضللك القديم

translations.translation: They said, 'By Allah! Your mind is still astray.'
They said: "By God, you are still persisting in your old delusion."
They said: "Surely you are still in your same old craze."
His people said, "By God, you are still making the same old error".
They said, “By Allah, you are still deeply engrossed in the same old love of yours.”
They said: "By Allah! Certainly, you are in your old Dalal (error)."
They said: By Allah, you are most surely in your old error.
They said, 'By God, thou art certainly in thy ancient error.
(Those around him) said: By Allah, lo! thou art in thine old aberration.
They said, "By God, you still persist in your illusions!"
They said: by Allah! verily thou art in thine old-time error.
They said, ‘By God, you persist in your inveterate error.’
They said: "By Allah! truly thou art in thine old wandering mind."
They said: "By Allah! Certainly, you are in your old error."
By Allah' they said, 'this is but your old illusion'
They said, “By God, you are still in your old confusion.”
They said, "By Allah, indeed you are in your [same] old error."

[12:95]   They said, to him: ‘By God, you are certainly in your misguidance, your error, of old’, in your excessive adoration of him, and your [enduring] hope of encountering him [again] despite the length of time [that has passed].
((Those around him) said) those of his children who stayed with him and his grandchildren said: (By Allah, Lo! thou art in your old aberration) you are still in your old error concerning Joseph.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالُواْ } أي: الحضارون: { تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ } بتذكير يوسف وكثرة تحضيره ببالك { لَفِي ضَلاَلِكَ ٱلْقَدِيمِ } [يوسف: 95] أي: ضلالك الذي كنت عليه زماناً مستمراً، وهو وإن سفهه الناس تزايد وجدانه، ويترقى ساعة فساعة

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { قالوا } أي: الحاضرون: { تاللهِ إنك لفي ضلالِكَ القديم } أي: إنك لفي خطئك القديم بالإفراط في محبة يوسف، وإكثار ذكره، وتوقع لقائه
